title: shonnadellAm marandu
sahitya:
shonnadellAm marandu shOdanai sheidiDil enna nAn sheivEn en ayyanE guhanE


anupallavi

  panneDu nALAip-pArinil un tirup-pAdAmbujam paTri bhaktip-paravashamAi nAn


caraNam    inda ulaginil andakan enakku kandanE unnaiyallAl sondam vEruNDO
 shandaikkaDai idanai shaDudiyil tANDiDa undan vEl enakku UnrukOl aghAdO
